messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I jog every morning to keep my
Pokémon fit.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Oops!
You threw off my running rhythm.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Nothing beats being fit and healthy!Come on, won’t you run with me?
To a better tomorrow!
messages.TRMSG_NOT_MORNING_UNUSED: Do you jog every morning, too?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
When I go on my jogs, I pass by lots
of people.I have trouble remembering faces,
but we did meet before, right?
